column1: 821114,Plumber's Assistant,,Maintain or repair plumbing or drainage structures or fixtures
column5: Review blueprints or specifications to determine work requirements
column7: Inspect plumbing or drainage systems or fixtures
column13: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs
column19: Assist skilled construction or mining staff
column23: Load or unload materials used in construction or mining
column29: Install insulation in equipment or structures
column33: Measure materials or objects for installation or assembly
column45: Mark reference points on construction materials
column47: Install green plumbing or water handling systems
